byline.original: By ELISABETTA POVOLEDO; Compiled by DAVE ITZKOFF

snippet: The document, known as the “Inter Caetera” bull, is well known to scholars but perhaps less so to the general public, which will be able to peruse a fragment online at luxinarcana.org on Wednesday.
lead_paragraph: The document, known as the “Inter Caetera” bull, is well known to scholars but perhaps less so to the general public, which will be able to peruse a fragment online at luxinarcana.org on Wednesday.
